name: Soko Banana
storyline: Skid, a young monkey who accidentally destroyed all the bananas intended for the Great Banana Festival, have to save the event. Skid embarks on a journey across various islands, navigating banana warehouses to retrieve new bananas and ensure the festival proceeds as planned.
summary: "Soko Banana" is a puzzle game developed for the Nintendo Entertainment System (NES), inspired by the classic Sokoban concept. Players guide the young monkey, Skid, through banana warehouses across five distinct islands, each introducing unique mechanics such as pits, breakable blocks, and teleporters. The objective is to maneuver banana crates to designated exits while collecting bananas to unlock bonus levels. The game offers 55 levels in total, including hidden secrets.
